statements.name: PROC SQL
ALTER TABLE
statements.description: Adds columns to, drops columns from, and changes column attributes in an existing table. Adds, modifies, and drops integrity constraints from an existing table.
statements.help:
ALTER TABLE table-name
	<ADD  column-definition-1<, column-definition-2,  ...>>

	<ADD  constraint-specification-1<, constraint-specification-2,  ...>>

	<ADD CONSTRAINT constraint-name-1 constraint-specification-1<, constraint-name-2constraint-specification-2,  ...>
		>

	<DROP column-1<, column-2,  ...>>

	<DROP CONSTRAINT constraint-name-1<, constraint-name-2,  ...>>

	<DROP FOREIGN KEY constraint-name>

	<DROP PRIMARY KEY >

	<MODIFY column-definition-1<, column-definition-2,  ...>>
                                       ;

statements.name: CONNECT
statements.description: Establishes a connection with a DBMS that SAS/ACCESS software supports.

statements.name: CREATE INDEX
statements.description: Creates indexes on columns in tables.

statements.name: CREATE TABLE
CREATE VIEW
statements.description: Creates a PROC SQL view from a query expression.

statements.name: DELETE
statements.description: Removes one or more rows from a table or view that is specified in the FROM clause.

statements.name: DESCRIBE
statements.description: Displays a PROC SQL definition in the SAS log.

statements.name: DISCONNECT
statements.description: Ends the connection with a DBMS that a SAS/ACCESS interface supports.

statements.name: EXECUTE
statements.description: Sends a DBMS-specific SQL statement to a DBMS that a SAS/ACCESS interface supports.

statements.name: INSERT
statements.description: Adds rows to a new or existing table or view.
statements.help:
INSERT INTO table-name | sas/access-view | proc-sql-view
<(column-1<, column-2,  ...>)>
	SET column1=sql-expression-1<, column-2=sql-expression-2,  ...>
INSERT INTO table-name | sas/access-view | proc-sql-view
<(column-1 <, column-2,  ...>)>
	VALUES  (value-1<, value-2,  ...>) 
		<VALUES  (value-1<, value-2,  ...>) >;
INSERT INTO table-name | sas/access-view | proc-sql-view
<(column-1<, column-2,  ...>)>
query-expression;

statements.name: QUIT
statements.description: Executes any statements that have not executed and ends the procedure.

statements.name: RESET
statements.description: Resets PROC SQL options without restarting the procedure.

statements.name: SELECT
statements.description: Selects columns and rows of data from tables and views.
statements.help:
SELECT <DISTINCT | UNIQUE>object-item-1<, object-item-2,  ...>
	
		<INTO macro-variable-specification-1<, macro-variable-specification-2,  ...>>
		FROM from-list
		<WHERE sql-expression>
		<GROUP BY group-by-item-1<, group-by-item-2,  ...>>
		<HAVING sql-expression>
		<ORDER BY order-by-item-1<,  order-by-item-2 <ASC | DESC>,  ...>>;

statements.name: UPDATE
statements.description: Modifies a column's values in existing rows of a table or view.

statements.name: VALIDATE
statements.description: Checks the accuracy of a query expression's syntax and semantics without executing the expression.
